notes: Updated styling with more modern appearance. Special editions: Lil' Red Express (1978-1979), Warlock, Utiline. Club Cab option. Heavy-duty capabilities. Vintage truck requires period-specific service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge D series article, January 2025 revision.

Full-size SUV based on D/W pickup platform. Removable fiberglass hardtop. Competed with Ford Bronco. Trail Duster was Plymouth version. Vintage complexity requires specialized knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Dodge Ramcharger article, January 2025 revision.
